Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Small figurine of a half-bent person
Description: This amulet in blue-green faience represents a half-bending person, the right knee on the ground and left raised. The two arms are raised on both sides of a disk placed on the head. It's the "uplifter" god Shu or the genie "Heh" who symbolises a  great number of years or eternity.
